title: Understanding Summary Functions
text: Summary functions can be inserted in different ways depending on the software or tool you are using. It's important to know the common methods available.

title: Using Menus for Summary Functions
text: One common way to insert summary functions is through the use of menus. Think about the different menus available in your software.

title: Shortcut Menus
text: Shortcut menus often provide quick access to frequently used functions, including summary functions. Consider how you might access these menus.

hintAnswer: shortcut menu of a cell, field button menu, Field Settings button
title: Identifying the Correct Methods
text: Which of the following are correct ways to insert summary functions?
choices: shortcut menu of a cell, field button menu, Field Settings button
shortcut menu of a cell, field button menu, CTRL + function
manually inputting them, shortcut menu, Field Settings button
